content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.T_STTransactionsDetail') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STTransactionsDetail
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STTransactionsDetail (
	[sap_transactionsline_polookupid] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsheader_docentry] int,
	[sap_transactionsheader_docnum] int,
	[sap_transactionsheader_doctype] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsheader_objtype] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsheader_postingdate] date,
	[sap_transactionsheader_duedate] date,
	[sap_transactionsheader_cardcode] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsheader_cardref] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsheader_discprcnt] numeric(18,2),
	[sap_transactionsheader_discsum] numeric(18,2),
	[sap_transactionsheader_doctotal] numeric(18,2),
	[sap_transactionsheader_comments] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsheader_transid] int,
	[sap_transactionsheader_u_expense_depot] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsline_linenum] int,
	[sap_transactionsline_linestatus] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsline_itemcode] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsline_dscription] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsline_quantity] numeric(18,2),
	[sap_transactionsline_openqty] numeric(18,2),
	[sap_transactionsline_price] numeric(18,2),
	[sap_transactionsline_rate] numeric(18,2),
	[sap_transactionsline_discprcnt] numeric(18,2),
	[sap_transactionsline_linetotal] numeric(18,2),
	[sap_transactionsline_linetotallessdiscount] numeric(18,2),
	[sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinal] numeric(18,2),
	[sap_transactionsline_opensum] numeric(18,2),
	[sap_transactionsline_pricebefdi] numeric(18,2),
	[sap_transactionsline_docdate] date,
	[sap_transactionsline_project] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsline_vatprcnt] numeric(18,2),
	[sap_transactionsline_vatgroup] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsline_vatamount] numeric(18,2),
	[sap_transactionsline_u_reason] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsline_u_expenseitem] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsline_u_fueldate] date,
	[sap_transactionsline_acctcode] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsline_doccat] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsline_subdepotcode] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsline_u_rate] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsline_u_ir_number] int,
	[sap_transactionsline_discsum] numeric(18,2),
	[sap_transactionsline_vatrate] numeric(18,2),
	[sap_transactionsline_description] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsline_jnlref1] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsline_jnlref2] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsline_invntitem] nvarchar(4000),
	[sap_transactionsline_exception] nvarchar(4000)





	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/FINANCE/sttransactionsdetail.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.T_STTransactionsDetail 
GO
